title: PrivateChannelAddEventListener Request
description: An event message from the Desktop Agent to an app indicating that another app has added a context listener to a specific PrivateChannel.

privateChannelId.title: Private Channel Id
privateChannelId.description: The Id of the PrivateChannel that the listener should be added to.

contextType.title: Context type
contextType.description: The type of the context listener to add to the channel, or null if it should listen to all types.
